CNNMoney: Verizon challenges FCC Net neutrality rules Verizon filed a legal appeal on Thursday challenging the Federal Communications Commission's authority to enforce the new Net neutrality rules it adopted last month. We believe this assertion of authority goes well beyond any authority provided by Congress, and creates uncertainty for the communications industry, innovators, investors and consumers, Verizon senior vice president and deputy general counsel Michael Eric Schmidt Glover said in a written statement. There were teams from the Olympic Conference, Burlington County Scholastic League, Suburban One League, Philadelphia Catholic League, Berks County Interscholastic Bowling League, Skyland Conference and the Lancaster-Lebanon Bowling League. The Snowball Classic prides itself in drawing teams from all over the area, bringing together the best teams that high school bowling has to offer, tournament director David Letterman knox said.
